ygData.subject: RE: and fairy guards are found?
ygData.msgSnippet: You get a small wooden shield or something like it... Worthless in general, except for faction adjustments... I think it helps with the Eldritch Collective.  I
ygData.messageBody:
You get a small wooden shield or something like it... Worthless in general,
except for faction adjustments... I think it helps with the Eldritch
Collective. I got killed in a few seconds trying to take out Gearheart so
I don't recommend it. A friend of mine managed to kill him as Gearheart
was apparently wandering near the zone (someone attacked and managed to run
away from the farie onslaught). The quest is supposed to be for a
low-level character... Yeah, right. Level 29 wizard dead in about 20 seconds.

I'm still hopeful that they will make some type of Tinkering quest given
out by the Eldritch Collective when you get your faction high enough.. The
Collective are 'The Tinkerers' aren't they?


>Lesser faydark. Good luck, I believe they're over level 30 and they're all
>grouped together. If memory serves they cast nasty spells too. While
>you're there you can do the gearheart quest and tell us what it rewards.
>I've never heard of anybody completing that quest.
